entry.title: JET AR316SD - 3/16 Inch Air Riveter Super Heavy Duty 409007
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Riveters
Price: 893.02

[shortdesc]

3/16 Inch Air Riveter – Super Heavy Duty

  • New production quality air riveter delivers a powerful pulling load of 2,600 lbs
  • Can be used on aluminum, steel and stainless steel rivets up to 3/16"
  • Specific components manufactured with high cost, super precise CNC deep hole drilling processes for extreme accuracy and tolerance
  • Longer 20mm stroke sets rivets in one hit, increasing efficiency
  • Integrated vacuum/exhaust system with a convenient adjustable switch allows operator to adjust mandrel retention and collection
  • Designed with integrated spring and air return system for fast, reliable cycles
  • Japanese NOK rubber gasket for longest tool life
  • Specially designed "quick opening" collection bottle eliminates the need to remove bottle when emptying
  • Includes 4 sizes of nose pieces for a wide range of uses
  • Designed for production and heavy duty power riveting applications
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Air Consumption 5.5
    Air Thread 1/4 Inch
    Hose Diameter 3/8 Inch
    Product Type Riveters
    Sound Level 75
    Vibration Level 2.5

    Extra Product Information

  • New production quality air riveter delivers a powerful pulling load of 2,600 lbs
  • Can be used on aluminum, steel and stainless steel rivets up to 3/16"

    • Product Information

  • Stroke : 0.78 Inch (20mm)
  • Pull Force : 2,600 lb
  • Average Air Consumption : 5.5 cfm
  • Min
  • Hose Size : 3/8 Inch
  • Air Inlet (NPT) : 1/4 Inch
  • Nosepiece : 3/32 Inch (2.4mm), 1/8 Inch (3.2mm), 5/32 Inch (4.0mm), 3/16 Inch (4.8mm)
  • Vibration: 2.5 m/s²
  • Vibration: 75 dBA

1/4 Inch Air Riveter – Super Heavy Duty

  • New production quality air riveter delivers a powerful pulling load of 3,520 lbs

entry.title: 3M 695-1X36 - Riveters Tape 695 Yellow With White Adhesive 1 in x 36 Yards Bulk 7000048595
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Riveters Tapes
Price: 25.20

[shortdesc]

3M(TM) Riveters Tape 695 Yellow with White Adhesive, 1 in x 36 yd, 36 per case Bulk

  • 3M™ Riveters Tape 695 has a polyethylene film backing and an acrylic adhesive coating along both edges of the tape
  • The transparent, yellow, tack-free centre window improves visibility during the riveting process.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Riveters Tapes

    Product Information

  • Zone-coated adhesive sticks to substrate without adhering to the rivet
  • Polyethylene backing maintains a tight hold on the rivet during the assembly process
  • Uncoated, transparent yellow centre provides clear visibility to the rivet below
  • Aggressive adhesive bonds well to many surfaces, yet removes cleanly
  • Decreases product rework and improves efficiency
  • Waterproof and easily removable
    		•
